narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Axis In-home, Inc. is a Home Health provider based in Orem, UT. From 2021-10 through 2022-04, this provider received $68K in Medicaid payments across 854 claims serving 209 beneficiaries, billing 2 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: 99% of all billing comes from a single procedure code: S9131 (S9131). This extreme concentration is unusual and may indicate specialized services or a narrow billing pattern.
Billing stopped in 2022-04, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.
